subTitle: Ask us anything about our brand and products, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: What types of bolts and fasteners does HAHUTECH offer?
faqs.answer: HAHUTECH offers a wide variety of bolts, screws, and nuts with different standards such as DIN, JIS, ANSI, and ISO. We have complete strength grades from 4.8, 8.8, 10.9, 12.9 and various sizes from M3 to M100, suitable for all industrial and construction needs.

faqs.question: Do HAHUTECH products meet quality standards?
faqs.answer: All HAHUTECH products are manufactured according to international quality standards and strictly inspected before delivery. We are committed to providing high-quality products with the best durability and precision.

faqs.question: Does HAHUTECH offer discounts for bulk orders?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have attractive discount policies for bulk orders. The discount rate depends on the order volume and product type. Please contact our sales team for detailed consultation and the best quotation.

faqs.question: What is HAHUTECH's delivery time?
faqs.answer: For in-stock products, we can deliver within 24 hours in the city and 2-3 days for other provinces. For custom manufacturing orders, the time will be specifically agreed upon based on the volume and complexity of the order.

faqs.question: Does HAHUTECH accept custom bolt and fastener manufacturing?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! HAHUTECH accepts processing and manufacturing of bolts and fasteners according to customer drawings and specific technical requirements. We have a professional technical team ready to advise and support from design to production.

faqs.question: How to order and pay with HAHUTECH?
faqs.answer: You can place orders via phone, email, or directly at the company office. We support multiple payment methods such as bank transfer, cash, or credit terms for loyal customers. Our sales team will support and guide you throughout the ordering process.
